title: Force on bar magnet from wire loop with current

content.question: A bar magnet and a wire loop carrying current I are arranged as shown above. In which direction, if any, is the force on the current loop due to the magnet?

choices.label: Toward the top of the page
Toward the bottom of the page
There is no force on the current loop.
